Title: The Lion King
Description: All Clara wants is a key -a one-of-a-kind key that will unlock a box that holds a priceless gift from her mother. A golden thread, presented to her at godfather Drosselmeyer's annual holiday party, leads her to the coveted key-which promptly disappears into a strange and mysterious parallel world...
